mapper.select: SELECT log_id AS logId, task_id AS taskId, task_name AS taskName, title, description, task_date AS taskDate FROM task_log ORDER BY task_date DESC
SELECT log_id AS logId, task_id AS taskId, task_name AS taskName, title, description, task_date AS taskDate FROM task_log ORDER BY task_date DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT log_id AS logId, task_id AS taskId, task_name AS taskName, title, description, task_date AS taskDate FROM task_log WHERE log_id = #{logId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task_log (task_id, task_name, title, description, task_date) VALUES (#{taskId}, #{taskName}, #{title}, #{description}, #{taskDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE task_log SET task_id = #{taskId}, task_name = #{taskName}, title = #{title}, description = #{description}, task_date = #{taskDate} WHERE log_id = #{logId}
